item.title: [FR][xDSL] - Internet perturbation
item.description:
Jul 12, 16:53 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 12/07/2024 13:15 UTC
End time : 12/07/2024 16:53 UTC
Root cause : Network equipment malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 12, 14:38 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 12/07/2024 13:15 UTC
Service impact : Customer connection may be down.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

IMPORTANT : If you haven't lost your internet connection, please don't restart your modem until this incident is resolved.

IMPORTANT : Si vous n'avez pas perdu votre connexion internet, ne redémarrez pas votre modem tant que cet incident n'est pas résolu.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Web Cloud] - Incident on ovh.us domain
item.description:
Jul 10, 10:28 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 09/07/2024 22:00 UTC
End time : 10/07/2024 02:16 UTC
Root cause : We had a technical issue with our domain provider
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 10, 01:01 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : The issue has been fixed.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Jul 10, 00:33 UTC
Update - Our technical teams and our provider fixed the root cause that caused the incident.
It may take 1 hour for the impact to be totally cleared.

Jul 10, 00:09 UTC
Identified - Our technical teams identified the root cause of the incident and are currently working with our registrar to solve the issue.

Jul 9, 22:36 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 09/07/2024 22:00 UTC
Service impact : .us domain names are temporarily unavailable
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [BHS/GRA][Web Hosting] - Database upgrade maintenance
item.description:
Jul 11, 10:16 UTC
Update - 1230 databases are now running MySQL 8.0 on cluster eu010.

Jul 10, 09:04 UTC
Update - Update : Our teams have updated 120 databases

Jul 10, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 9, 16:26 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our databases.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 10/07/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 30/09/2024 12:00 UTC
Service impact : A 1 minute downtime is expected.
Service improvement : We are going to upgrade MySQL 5.7 to MySQL 8.0. The upgrades will occur every Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday.
The goal of this maintenance is to improve the performance and enhance the security of our infrastructure.

The maintenance work will be carried out in 2 phases.
The first phase will begin on:
Start time : 10/07/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 25/07/2024 12:00 UTC

The second phase will begin on:
Start time : 12/08/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 30/09/2024 12:00 UTC
Progress will be posted here.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Web Hosting] - SSL Let's Encrypt automatic key generation incident notification
item.description:
Jul 9, 13:36 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 03/07/2024 00:00 UTC
End time : 09/07/2024 13:20 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a software issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 8, 16:35 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : Our technical teams implemented a temporary fix.
Automatic SSL key regeneration for Let's Encrypt is available again.
Our technical teams are currently working on the definitive fix

Jul 8, 15:47 UTC
Identified - Root cause : Software issue
Workaround: Customers can manually regenerate SSL keys from the Manager
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working on a fix to solve the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made

Jul 8, 15:44 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 03/07/2024 00:00 UTC
Service impact : Automatic SSL keys regeneration for Let's Encrypt is temporarily unavailable
Workaround: Customers can manually regenerate SSL keys from the Manager
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working to solve the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made
